audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Religion

database.fullpath: Database Environment :: Network-based DBMS :: Microsoft SQL Server

name: openGate Check In
short_description:
openGate is a check in web-based application developed to integrate with the church management software ArenaChMS.

The application is designed to quickly check users in by displaying a list of people by name within a given group.  Groups are compiled based on how they are organized within ArenaChMS.

The application runs external to the Arena user interface.  It writes directly to the Arena database, adjusting it in the same way the Arena interface updates the database when checking in a user in.  Check in status then can be displayed like normal via the Arena interface.

The advantages of this system is speed.  A large number of people can be checked in within a short timeframe.
summary: openGate is a check in app developed to integrate with ArenaChMS
